data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Zasavska.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zasavska, Slovenia

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Zasavska, Slovenia that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 87 believers in the state of Zasavska with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Zasavska access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Kisovec
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Kisovec, Zasavska, Slovenia.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 87 believers in Zasavska, Slovenia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 87 believers in Zasavska to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.section_summary:
the state of Zasavska, Slovenia has a population of 41,700.

We estimate Zasavska has 87 people who might know Jesus, 22,457 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,156 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 479 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Zasavska to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

location.name: Zasavska
location.cities_list: Trbovlje, Zagorje ob Savi, Hrastnik, Kisovec, Dol pri Hrastniku
